mapper.insert: insert into oa_teamwork_set (i_id, i_order, description, i_teamwork_id, i_bus_model_id, i_bus_function_id, s_create_by, s_create_deptid, s_create_unitid, d_create_time, d_update_time, i_version ) values (null, #{iOrder}, #{description}, #{iTeamworkId}, #{iBusModelId}, #{iBusFunctionId}, #{sCreateBy}, #{sCreateDeptid}, #{sCreateUnitid}, #{dCreateTime}, #{dUpdateTime}, #{iVersion} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_teamwork_set SET i_order = #{iOrder} ,description = #{description},i_teamwork_id = #{iTeamworkId},i_bus_model_id = #{iBusModelId} ,i_bus_function_id = #{iBusFunctionId} ,s_create_by = #{sCreateBy},s_create_deptid = #{sCreateDeptid},s_create_unitid = #{sCreateUnitid},d_create_time = #{dCreateTime},d_update_time = #{dUpdateTime},i_version = #{iVersion} where i_id = #{iId}
mapper.select: select max(i_order) from oa_teamwork_set where i_teamwork_id = #{iTeamworkId}
select * from oa_teamwork_set where i_teamwork_id =(select i_id from oa_teamwork where s_teamwork_name =#{TeamworkName})
select f.s_name from oa_teamwork_set s INNER JOIN oa_bus_function f where i_teamwork_id = #{iTeamworkId} and f.i_id = s.i_bus_function_id
select s.i_bus_function_id from oa_teamwork_set s INNER JOIN oa_bus_function f where i_teamwork_id = #{iTeamworkId} and f.i_id = s.i_bus_function_id
select s.i_bus_model_id from oa_teamwork_set s INNER JOIN oa_bus_function f where i_teamwork_id = #{iTeamworkId} and f.i_id = s.i_bus_function_id
select * from oa_teamwork_set where i_teamwork_id = #{iTeamworkId} and i_order = #{iOrder}
